Text: Yes has always been one of if not the favorite band of mine. There's stuff here I had no idea existed. Thanks so much beerpal. Keep up the great work!
Been at 99.9% for days now, I havent given up one the one songs yet.  Seeding also.
Oh, forgot to add, thank you beerpal for the upload, your music ROCKS!
You have made this Yes fan VERY VERY happy on numerous occasions. Some of this stuff I've never seen anyplace else. Thanks!

outstanding group, outstanding collection in a torrent.

Major complaint: why no Yessongs? Arguably the best live Yes you will ever hear, at their peak and a commercially available lp??

If you 28 leachers - 4 seeders??? Leachers open up your bandwith allocation and set your upload limit to unlimited. This torrent will speed up 10X. At the current rate I'll be dead by the time this downloads!!!
I forgot to thank beerpal for this and the many links that are posted!!! Thank You!!!
